name: BlockBuster (Scancee)
description:
BlockBuster is a Breakout-Clone and my first game to ever be released. It has some rough edges but since I had actual fun while play testing it might as well be publicly available.

To spice things up the Paddle has a dash ability. The ball can only destroy blocks of it's own color and will randomly change color when hitting a wrong block.

There are five incredibly hard levels. You only have 3 balls to finish the game but if you make it you can create even harder challenges in the level editor.
